search_results.title: Joy Banner, Ph.D. - Co-Founder & Co-Director
search_results.snippet: Dr. Joy Banner is Co-Founder and Co-Director of The Descendants Project, a nonprofit foundation committed to the liberation of the Black descendant community.

search_results.title: Twin sisters buy former plantation to preserve and protect ...
search_results.snippet: The Banner twins are the founders of The Descendants Project, a nonprofit that fights for historic and cultural preservation for descendants of enslaved people.
